display.title: Idol of Worship, Dragon Altar
display.description: A Dragon Altar Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, a stack of Endstone, Dragon Egg, & Soul Lantern onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 64x Endstone 1x Dragon Egg 1x Soul Lantern | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
